title: How bus stations can become a tool for BFSI to promote rural fintech & digital education
description: Bus stations in rural India are becoming key platforms for promoting fintech literacy. With high footfall and strategic locations, these hubs offer an opportunity to spread awareness about financial services. BFSI companies are leveraging digital systems and traditional street plays to educate the public on secure financial transactions and digital payments.
